ai-patthana16.70:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.70:0.3_0: Telling for oneself is the production of mind and body-contact.
ai-patthana16.70:1.1_0: Not longing for the sake of non-existence, consciousness doesn’t give rise to the mental resolution, is for the sake of consciousness.
ai-patthana16.70:1.1_1: This is the section in brief.
